stanza.line: If the dull substance of my flesh were (a)thought(/a)
Injurious distance should not stop my (b)way(/b)
For then despite of space I would be (a)brought(/a)
From limits far remote where thou dost (b)stay(/b)
No matter then although my foot did (c)stand(/c)
Upon the farthest earth removed from (d)thee(/d)
For nimble thought can jump both sea and (c)land(/c)
As soon as think the place where he would (d)be(/d)
But ah thought kills me that I am not (e)thought(/e)
To leap large lengths of miles when thou art (f)gone(/f)
But that so much of earth and water (e)wrought(/e)
I must attend time's leisure with my (f)moan(/f)
But heavy tears badges of either's (g)woe(/g)
